sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Triturados Engine is a high-performance engine for pixel art games, optimized for LED matrix displays and real-time effects.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- Pixel-perfect rendering
- Lua scripting support
- Real-time LED output

sections.title: Hardware Used
sections.content:
- Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
- RGB LED Matrix Panel

sections.title: How it Works
sections.content: The engine streams game frames to the LED matrix using a custom Node.js backend and the `node-pixel-pusher` library.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content: Triturados Engine brings fast, creative pixel art to hardware displays.
